summary: Email chain regarding a grand jury subpoena for American Airlines travel records related to Ghislaine Maxwell. An analyst from American Airlines provides passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and usage information in response to the subpoena.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued for Travel Records
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued, requesting American Airlines travel records related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: American Airlines Provides Subpoenaed Records
events.description: American Airlines analyst Donna Williams sent passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and ticket usage information for Ghislaine Maxwell in response to the grand jury subpoena.

keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued for American Airlines travel records related to Ghislaine Maxwell.
American Airlines provided passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and ticket usage information for Maxwell.
The records were sent via email on February 7, 2020, by American Airlines analyst Donna Williams.
The email chain indicates the documents were password-protected, with a passcode to be sent separately.
This document shows active grand jury investigation activity into Maxwell's travel as of early 2020.
